long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EcoSurf is an extension that calculates the total emissions of your browsing habits by factoring the expenditure of energy created by your data requests and network type along with the fuel portfolio of the web-company you are interacting with. Our extension gives you a real-time estimate on the Carbon Emission users have contributed to the environment for any website they access.
